text:
I would love it if I could have global selects within a module and/or aggregate selects within a module

Take for example a simple survey.
You would have 2 primary groups Results and Question Groups

the results would basically be a keystore that you would use with JS
result_a, result_b, result_c

Each question group has a group called “Questions” and within that, a group called “Answers” Each answer has a Text field and a value field. It would be great if this value field could be a select of the Results group.

The other thing would be an aggregate select field. Each question group also has some form of unique ID
An answer in Group A that, if selected should skip Group B and go to Group C
it would be great to have a select comprised of all the groups’ ID fields.

All of this can be done with some validation and hand-typing values but it’s extremely messy.
This may be hard to make a mental model of. Happy to clarify any questions.
